The Source Object¶

This object is used for aliases and triggers, and contains a couple of useful functions for the storage of code, and the serialisation of the resulting objects.

Read the API docs to learn the features.

The Source Object API¶

Aliases and triggers as objects.

class source.Source(pattern, code, classes, simple, title)¶

The top level object from which aliases and triggers are derived.

serialise()¶

Export the contents as (args, kwargs), ready to pass back into addAlias(), or addTrigger().

setCode(code)¶

Adds code to the object, compiling it ready for use.
